definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
a person of great moral stature does not remember the offenses committed by one of low moral stature
pinyin: da4 ren2 bu4 ji4 xiao3 ren2 guo4

sentences.english: It is the great who is assailed by envy.
sentences.chinese: 正是大人物才受到嫉妒的中傷。

sentences.english: He thinks most people are " Phonies ", especially adults4.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲絕大多數人都是騙子，尤其是大人。

sentences.english: Leadership Don't get blinded by the cult-hero worshiped "Big L" leaders;
sentences.chinese: 領導能力無須盲目崇拜“大人物”領導者。

sentences.english: Our guide, who was a French Canadian, was an excellent cook.
sentences.chinese: 我們的嚮導是一個法裔加拿大人，他很擅長烹調。

sentences.english: Aboriginal Australians live on average seventeen fewer years than white Australians.
sentences.chinese: 原住澳大利亞人比白種加拿大人平均少活17年左右。

sentences.english: She had seen the world and lived with great people and raised herself far beyond her original humble station.
sentences.chinese: 她見過了世面，結識了大人物，地位比從前高得多。

sentences.english: M. S - I've already done that, Your Honor.
The little boy talked as if he were an adult.
sentences.chinese: 這個小男兒講起話來像大人。

sentences.english: The adult must help children debug "KUPAO" when they use it for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 大人必須幫助孩子在第一次使用前調試好酷步。

sentences.english: Why is the man in black the thief?
sentences.chinese: 你知道包大人是如何辨認出小偷的嗎？

sentences.english: Telling an adult is not snitching.
V. D - Your Honor, we'd like to recess if we could.
sentences.chinese: 大人，如果可以的話我提議休庭。

sentences.english: These memories will always recall the fact I am an HKUST alumna.
sentences.chinese: 這些記憶將會不斷提醒自己是科大人。

sentences.english: Is stuffy voice"H'm" base, chief executive officer's adult helplessly also has to follow to leave.
sentences.chinese: 悶着聲“嗯”了下，總裁大人無奈的也只好跟着動身。

sentences.english: When the bees busy dancing in the flowers, the adults are busy in the land.
sentences.chinese: 當蜜蜂飛舞在花間忙碌時，大人也在土地裏忙個不停。

sentences.english: In a flash of gunpowder, a giant explodes onto the stage of history.
sentences.chinese: 在隆隆炮火的閃射中，歷史舞臺上出現了一個大人物。

definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
lit. little princess/fig. spoiled girl/female version of 小皇帝[xiao3 huang2 di4]
polite term for old woman or man
